item.title: The Matrix is coming back for a fifth movie
item.description:
Deadline reports that The Martian writer Drew Goddard has been tapped to pen and direct another Matrix movie executive produced by Lana Wachowski. Currently, the new film has no title or projected premiere date, and thereâ€™s been no announcement as to whether franchise stars like Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, or Jessica Henwick will return.

Not sure how to feel about this, but I'll end up watching anyway.

]]>

item.title: Book Review - Agency
item.description:
Just finished reading Agency by William Gibson. I was not a big fan. I posted my review with more details.

Agency Review

]]>

item.title: Clarkesworld - Sci-fi and Fantasy Magazine
item.description:
Clarkesworld is a monthly science fiction and fantasy magazine first published in October 2006. Each issue contains interviews, thought-provoking articles, and between six and eight works of original fiction.

]]>
